article:
Would you like to be volunteers? Many people think volunteering is not _ . However, when I became a  _ , I thought it was great fun.
During the summer camp, there were many _  joining in. They wanted to _    time with their kids and hoped to take a rest from the busy life.
You could see these parents  _  from the time they arrived. They worked hard in the camp _  doing the dishes, taking kids to see the doctor, buying things, cleaning around the rooms and taking  _  in all kinds of activities. They were full of energy   to be _  to do so much work. At the end of the camp, it was so _  to say goodbye to each other. I really thanked them. They were always giving but never  asking for  anything in return  . Thank you, summer camp parents.
